abstract: megan and maren join our team .
article: we are really excited about having strengthened our team in oslo with front-end developer megan pearson and copywriter maren granrud . megan pearsonmegan is a front-end developer who has already impressed us with both her technical abilities and great sense of humor . she holds a bachelor 's degree in aviation technology from purdue university . yes , she is an actual flight instructor and can fly airplanes ! megan originally hails from new york , but has lived and worked in oslo for the past two years . we are also very hopeful that her dog barkley will be a frequent staff member at our office .

maren granrudmaren joins us as a copywriter , although to be fair , she has been a part of our team ever since her internship last summer . needless to say , she was so good that we had to get her onboard . maren is a writing student at westerdals school of communication , and has already been deep into a lot of different projects putting her excellent wording skills to great use . we could n't be happier having them both onboard !
